column2: Danny, thank you for thinking I'm funny. Seriously. I didn't think I was cool until I realized how much you laughed at everything I said. HAHA just kidding. Thank you for always being such a joy to be around. You've always been so reliable and trustworthy and I know I can come to you for anything. I'm going to miss seeing your science pun t-shirts and sharing Bob with you after LA meetings.
